snippet: Though M.T.A. ads have often attracted — and actively courted — controversy, they have also provided the authority with an unlikely revenue source.
abstract: So-called viewpoint advertising, which Metropolitan Transportation Authority now accepts along its subway and bus routes, has attracted controversy, but has also provided agency with revenue; back and forth response ads are putting MTA in unusual, and unanticipated, position of acting as sounding board for political issues.
lead_paragraph: Though M.T.A. ads have often attracted — and actively courted — controversy, they have also provided the authority with an unlikely revenue source.

headline.seo: M.T.A. Ad Space Becomes Platform for Mideast Politics
headline.main: A Platform, or Several, for Middle East Politics
headline.print_headline: A Platform, or Several, For Middle East Politics
